content.text: I give my dog a big hug and some breakfast before I leave for work.
I run and play frisbee with my dog.
What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Charlie.
Golden retrievers are so cute! I love their big fluffy tails.
They really are the best dogs. Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a cat named Mittens. She's a little ball of fur.
I love cats too. They're so independent and cute.
I know, right? I love watching her chase butterflies in the backyard.
That sounds adorable. I'm sure she's a great pet.
She is. She's always there to greet me when I come home from work.
That's so sweet. I'm glad you have such a great pet.
Thanks. I'm glad you have a great pet too.
Thanks. I'm sure they're both great pets.
